## IHasher.hash() method

Hashes plain text into a secure cryptographic hash

**Signature:**

```typescript
hash(text: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

text


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Plain text to hash (typically a password)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

Promise resolving to the generated hash string

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} When hashing operation fails

## Example


```typescript
const hasher = new BcryptHasher();
const hash = await hasher.hash('myPassword123');
// Output: '$2b$10$X12aC9b6B9Uf9Z8Z9Y8Z9O...'
```
